#summary Como instalar
#labels Featured

= Requirements =
Maven >= 3 on system PATH.

= Usage =
Add the dependency to your project.
{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.specrunner</groupId>
    <artifactId>specrunner</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.1</version>
</dependency>
}}}
For other profiles, the syntax is like:
{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.specrunner</groupId>
    <artifactId>specrunner-webdriver</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.1</version>
</dependency>
}}}
